title: "Vim: Moving to Next Search Pattern in Incremental Search"

In Vim's incremental search, you can navigate through matches without committing the search or leaving search mode.

* Press `<C-g>` (Ctrl+G) to move to the next match.
* Press `<C-t>` (Ctrl+T) to move to the previous match.
